docs.title: REST Against Humanity
docs.text:
REST Against Humanity is a public API for Cards Against Humanity. You can use it to programatically obtain sets of cards from any of Cards Against Humanity's 71 official packs.

You should probably read the rules of Cards Against Humanity before using this API.

REST Against Humanity is accessible at https://restagainsthumanity.com/api/graphql.

This is a GraphQL API

This version of REST Against Humanity uses GraphQL. You should familiarize yourself with the GraphQL language before using it.

docs.title: Introspection
docs.text:
You can explore the API's schema and build queries from the comfort of your browser with GraphiQL.

docs.text:
List Cards Against Humanity packs.

Argument Type Description Required? where PackInput! Criteria by which to filter the packs returned. No

docs.title: PackType
docs.text:
A Cards Against Humanity pack.

Field Type Description name String! The name of the pack. id Int! The ID of the pack. black [BlackCardType!]! The pack's black cards. white [WhiteCardType!]! The pack's white cards.

For the black field:

Argument Type Description Required? where BlackCardInput! Criteria by which to filter the cards returned. No

For the white field:

Argument Type Description Required? where WhiteCardInput! Criteria by which to filter the cards returned. No

docs.title: BlackCardType
docs.text:
A Cards Against Humanity black card.

Field Type Description text String! The text of the card. pick Int! The number of blank spaces the card has. pack PackType! The pack the card belongs to.

docs.title: WhiteCardType
docs.text:
A Cards Against Humanity white card.

Field Type Description text String! The text of the card. pack PackType! The pack the card belongs to.

docs.title: PackInput
docs.text:
Criteria by which to filter packs.

Field Type Description Required? name String The name of the pack. No id Int The ID of the pack. No

docs.title: BlackCardInput
docs.text:
Criteria by which to filter black cards.

Field Type Description Required? text String The text of the card. No pick Int The number of blank spaces the card has. No

docs.title: WhiteCardInput
docs.text:
Criteria by which to filter white cards.

Field Type Description Required? text String The text of the card. No

docs.title: Listing all packs and cards
docs.text:
query {
packs {
name
black {
text
pick
}
white {
text
}
}
}

docs.title: Listing all black cards with a pick of 2
docs.text:
query {
packs {
name
black(where: { pick: 2 }) {
text
pick
}
}
}
